name: Etch-A-Sketch Simulator
description:
Introducing the Etch-A-Sketch Simulator !

With our newest proprietary technology we have perfectly recreated  the revolutionary technology of the legendary Etch-A-Sketch !
Twist it ! Shake it ! Draw it !

Use the Mouse to control the Etch-A-Sketch

Hidden bonus controls (for sissies):
You can draw with the arrow keys or "WASD" and erase with the "Space bar".

To return to the menu, press "Escape"
